content: I'm glad you provided these resources. I'll definitely start with the basics and practice consistently. I'm also considering taking online courses that can help me transition into a data science career. Do you think it's a good idea to take courses that are focused on specific industries, such as healthcare or finance, or should I stick to more general data science courses? My grandma has always said that it's good to have a niche, but I'm not sure if that's true in data science.
